function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pathogen survival on steel and plastic surfaces for up to three days","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission and environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Implementing regular cleaning and disinfection of steel and plastic surfaces","Technologies":"Use of disinfectants and cleaning technologies","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management and maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate exposure to natural sunlight and outdoor air","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of germicidal factors such as sunlight and ultraviolet light","Mitigation":"Designing buildings with sufficient windows for natural light and air circulation","Technologies":"Use of architectural design and construction methods to maximize natural light exposure","People":"Architects, construction engineers, and building designers","Owner":"Architecture and construction firms"},{"Description":"Inefficient infection prevention and control in indoor environments","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of infection and compromised health of building occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing designs that minimize the survival and transmission of infection sources","Technologies":"Use of adaptive construction methods and finishing materials to create infection-resistant surfaces","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, healthcare workers, and facility managers","Owner":"Architects, facility management teams"}]}
